snippet: Now, as then, it’s hard to separate the march from its messenger, Louis Farrakhan.
abstract: Charles M Blow Op-Ed column compares rally by Nation of Islam to commemorate 20th anniversary of 1995 Million Man March with original event; notes leader Louis Farrakhan's efforts to anticipate criticism by feminists, anti-racists and gay activists, but sees little substantial change in his message.
lead_paragraph: Now, as then, it’s hard to separate the march from its messenger, Louis Farrakhan.

headline.print_headline: The Million Man March, 20 Years On
